Classes/FHIRDateFormatter.html#/s:6eRpKi.abstract: Default initializer to create an instance of FHIRDateFormatter

Classes/FHIRDateFormatter.html#/s:6eRpKi.name: string(from:format:)
Classes/FHIRDateFormatter.html#/s:6eRpKi.abstract: Creates a String representative of the passed Date that is ideal to use for server communication

Classes/FHIRDateFormatter.html#/s:6eRpKi.name: date(from:format:)
Classes/FHIRDateFormatter.html#/s:6eRpKi.abstract: Creates a Date from a string if it conforms to one of the FHIR date formats

Classes/FHIRDateFormatter.html#/s:6eRpKi.name: stringWithLongUTCTimeZone(from:)
Classes/FHIRDateFormatter.html#/s:6eRpKi.abstract: Creates a date string with the format 2020-06-23T09:41:00+00:00

Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.name: init(disk:cloud:)
Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.abstract: Initialize a new ErxTaskRepository as the gateway between Presentation layer and underlying data layer(s)

Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.name: loadRemote(by:accessCode:)
Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.abstract: Get ErxTask by id from cloud (if possible)

Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.name: loadLocal(by:accessCode:)
Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.abstract: Load ErxTask by id from local store

Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.name: redeem(order:)
Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.abstract: Sends a redeem request of an ErxTask for the selected pharmacy

Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.name: saveLocal(communications:)
Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.abstract: Save communications isRead property to local data store.

Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.name: countAllUnreadCommunications(for:)
Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html#/s.abstract: Returns a count for all unread communications for the given profile

Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html.name: DefaultErxTaskRepository
Classes/DefaultErxTaskRepository.html.abstract: Repository for the app to the ErxTask data layer handling the syncing between its data stores.

Classes/FHIRDateFormatter.html.name: FHIRDateFormatter
Classes/FHIRDateFormatter.html.abstract: DateFormatter that should be used to parse FHIR date strings into dates and vice versa

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
